page.title: 05NEW INDUSTRIES 1
page.content:
In the last 20 years several new industries have come to Barrow. Here are those we found along Park Road:-
Yorkshire Heating Supplies:{K Shoes: Camille Simon:{Bowater Scott:}Ashley Accessories:{City Electrical Factors:} Sovereign Chemicals:{Bass Charrington {Depot:}Furness Plastics:{County Park {Motors:}British Cellophane:{Yarl {Hydraulic. { They have come in to make jobs in place of the old dying industries. The County Council and Barrow District Council have built factory units with money from the Government and the EEC. EEC money has been used to help improve roads around the north and west of Barrow (like Park Road), so that heavy lorries don't have to go through the town centre.
